Package com.warzone.team08.VM.entities

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.warzone.team08.VM.entities.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides different getter-setter methods to perform different operation on Continent entity.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Player()
    Initializes variables required to handle player state.

    • isHasDeployed

      public boolean isHasDeployed()
      Reduces the reinforcements. Checks if the player has already deployed the reinforcements.
      Returns:
      True if the player has deployed the reinforcements.

    • setHasDeployed

      public void setHasDeployed​(boolean p_hasDeployed)
      Sets the value indicating that if the player has deployed the reinforcements.
      Parameters:
      p_hasDeployed - Value of true if the player has deployed the reinforcements.

    • canPlayerReinforce

      public boolean canPlayerReinforce​(int p_usedReinforcementCount)
      Calculates the number of remaining reinforcements for the player.

      Shows error if the player orders more than reinforcements than in possession. This method also sets the remaining number of reinforcements left for the future use.

      Parameters:
      p_usedReinforcementCount - Total number of used reinforcements.
      Returns:
      True if the player can reinforce the armies; false otherwise.

    • isCanReinforce

      public boolean isCanReinforce()
      If player can issue the order or not.
      Returns:
      True if the player can issue the order.

    • setCanReinforce

      public void setCanReinforce​(boolean p_canReinforce)
      Sets the value for indicating that if player can issue the order.
      Parameters:
      p_canReinforce - Value of true if the player can issue the order.

    • issueOrder

      public void issueOrder() throws ReinforcementOutOfBoundException, InvalidCommandException, EntityNotFoundException, java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Gets order from the user and stores the order for the player.
      Throws:
      ReinforcementOutOfBoundException - If the player doesn't have enough reinforcement to issue the order.
      InvalidCommandException - If there is an error while preprocessing the user command.
      EntityNotFoundException - If the target country not found.
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - If any error while processing concurrent thread.
      java.lang.InterruptedException - If scheduled thread was interrupted.

    • addExecutedOrder

      public void addExecutedOrder​(Order p_executedOrder)
      Adds the order to the list of player's executed orders.
      Parameters:
      p_executedOrder - Executed order to be added.

    • getExecutedOrders

      public java.util.List<Order> getExecutedOrders()
      Gets the list of executed orders.
      Returns:
      Value of the list of orders.

    • hasOrders

      public boolean hasOrders()
      Checks if the player has any order for execution.
      Returns:
      Value of true if the player has one or more orders.

    • nextOrder

      public Order nextOrder() throws OrderOutOfBoundException
      Gets the first order from the order list and removes the order from the list before returning it.
      Returns:
      Value of order to be executed.
      Throws:
      OrderOutOfBoundException - If the player does not have any order.
